Ending scene summary: Wife says she still loves MC but her body has fallen to the father. Father says from now on it's up to MC to pleasure his wife. MC wonders to himself if he can do so.

I'm surprised that it didn't end darker with the wife falling completely (mental + physical) to the father. The author states in the after-note that they have more ideas to write about both previous and future events in this story, so a sequel is possible (author hasn't decided whether they're doing that or continuing a previous well-received doujin). I'm hoping for another long sequel with the wife and father continuing to do their thing

They start living together and then slowly start falling in love. Then the guys dad has installed a camera in their bedroom and films them having sex. Then calls a meeting complaining that the wifey is having sex like a dead fish and not pleasuring her husband then goes on how they have an old tradition in their family that the dad get's to "teach" the new wifes how to pleasure their husbands. The son goes I don't want that! Then the wife goes I'll do it so I can learn how to pleasure my husband and fit into this family. Then it goes on for weeks-months where the dad fucks the wife over and over and because his dick is much bigger + he wasn't a virgin like the two of them he easily makes her fall to his dick. Then the end is pretty much the usual I'm sorry hubby but I've fallen for your dads dick and I am now carrying his child inside of me.
